1.0.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-country-cart-amount-shipping-module
1.0.description:
Shipping module for the WP E-Commerce system that offers a matrix of countries, and cart amounts, e.g.

U.K.

  • £0 and over - £5.00
  • £10 and over - £2.00
  • £25 and over - £0.00

France

  • £0 and over - £15.00
  • £10 and over - £12.00
  • £25 and over - £10.00

NOTE: This plugin is not compatible with the 3.8 series of WP e-Commerce.
